# object

**Instance Property**

The object that contains the property to assign.

## Declaration

```swift
final var object: Root? { get }
```

## Discussion

The subscriber holds a strong reference to this object until the upstream publisher calls [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Subscriber/receive(completion:)], at which point the subscriber sets this property to `nil`.

## Inspecting the assigned property

- **keyPath**: The key path that indicates the property to assign.
